properties.entry: SELECT INSTA_IMG_ORIGIN , INSTA_IMG_SRC FROM TB_INSTAGRAM LEFT JOIN TB_INSTA_IMAGE IMG ON (IMG_NO = INSTA_IMG_NO) WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY UPLOAD_DATE DESC

SELECT INSTA_IMG_ORIGIN , INSTA_IMG_SRC , COUNT(LIKE_NO) FROM TB_INSTAGRAM LEFT JOIN TB_INSTA_IMAGE ON (IMG_NO = INSTA_IMG_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_LIKE USING (COM_NO) WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY INSTA_IMG_ORIGIN , INSTA_IMG_SRC ORDER BY 3 DESC
INSERT INTO TB_ANSWER_INSTAGRAM ( ANS_NO , ANS_CONTENT , COM_NO , MEM_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_ANSWER_INSTAGRAM , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT ANS_NO , ANS_CONTENT , MEM_ID , TO_CHAR(ANS_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD HH:MI') "ANS_DATE" FORM TB_ANSWER_INSTAGRAM AN JOIN MEMBER ON (MEM_NO = MEM_NO) WHERE AN.DEL_YN = 'N' AND COM_NO = ? ORDER BY COM_NO DESC
INSERT INTO TB_INSTAGRAM ( COM_NO , COM_CONTENT , INSTA_ID , COM_TAG , MEM_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_INSTAGRAM.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO TB_INSTA_IMAGE ( INSTA_IMG_NO , INSTA_IMG_ORIGIN , INSTA_IMG_CHANGE , INSTA_IMG_SRC ) VALUES ( SEQ_INSTA_IMAGE.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? )
